attributes.action: Make public the true level of unemployment including all those claiming disability allowance and all those regarded as economically inactive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Large numbers of people have been diverted away from unemployment-related benefits (mainly Jobseeker’s Allowance) onto other benefits or out of the benefits system altogether. These people are therefore excluded from the official monthly unemployment figures, which count only the people claiming unemployment benefits.

In particular, a very large number of unemployed people with health problems have been diverted onto sickness-related benefits, mainly Incapacity Benefit.

What are the true figures?
